loans.use: to pay tuition fees and buy educational equipment for her daughter.

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.en:
Lorenza is a hardworking entrepreneur, who has a firewood vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for six years, and she earns additional income from a general store.

She is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy more stock of firewood to sell to her customers.

Lorenza has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more firewood to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Virgie

texts.en:
Virgie is 32 years old and married. She has four children. With three of her children in school, Virgie works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items, such as soap, sugar, and other groceries.

She has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF. She will use it in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

In the future Virgie would like to save enough money to expand her business, and to continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Luisa Almira

texts.es:
Luisa de 57 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado con esfuerzo y trabajo, debido a las condiciones económicas que tenía anteriormente su familia.  Gracias a los esfuerzos realizados logro que sus hijos obtuvieran su bachillerato general.

 Luisa ha dedicado los últimos 20 años de su vida a costura de ropa y su esposo a la producción de pan, ambos han aprendido de sus padres y tiene 2 hijos los cuales ya no están con ellos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar una máquina de coser más moderna para agilizar más su trabajo,  ya que la que usa le da algunas fallas. 

Los sueños que tiene a futuro es poder generar suficiente ingreso para cancelar su compromiso y ayudar a su familia, ademas con las ganancias quiere arreglar la infraestructura de la cocina que ya se encuentra un poco deteriorada.
texts.en:
Luisa is 57 years old. She studied until the third grade through effort and hard work due to the financial conditions her family previously had. Thanks to the effort she made, she was able to see that her children completed general trade school.

Luisa has earned a living for the last 20 years of her life by sewing clothes, and her husband is a baker. Both have learned the trades from their parents, and they have 2 children that no longer live with them.

The loan she is requesting is to buy a more modern sewing machine in order to better streamline her work, since the one she uses now has a few flaws. Her future dreams are to be able to generate enough income to pay back her loan and help her family. Also, with the business profits, she would like to remodel her kitchen since it is a little worn down.

loans.use: to buy a more modern sewing machine to better streamline her work.

loans.name: Marjul

texts.en:
Marjul resides in Clarin, Misamis Occidental, with her family. She operates a retail store, for income in addition to her husband's income, in order to make a living. Her previous loan was used for buying grocery goods, and she repaid it successfully.

Now, she wants more products to offer to her customers and to be able to gain more revenue. With this in mind, she took a new loan recently. She will use the loan to purchase grains for her store, in addition to her grocery goods, to expand her business. In the future, she wants to renovate her store to make it comfortable for her customers.

loans.use: to purchase grains for her store, in addition to her grocery goods, to expand her business.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.en:
Macaria is 54 years old and married, and she has five children. She works very hard to provide for them, running a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items.

She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF. She will use this amount to buy additional items to sell, like soy sauce, diapers, sanitary pads, detergent soap, cereals, and snack foods.

Macaria would like to build and expand her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell, like soy sauce, diapers, and cereals

loans.name: Lolina

texts.en:
Lolina is thankful for the financial assistance previously extended to her, as she was able to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and other products, needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another loan, in the amount of 60,000 PHP. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products, to add in her inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in a better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Lolina wants her business to continue to flourish, and she also desires to help support her grandchildren. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship members* to share stories of her life and business, and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.


*All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages, needed for her business.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es:
Manuel de 52 años de edad, no tiene ningún tipo de nivel académico ya que sus padres no le dieron la oportunidad de estudiar, actualmente está acompañado y tiene tres hijos los cuales dos de ellos ya no viven junto a él, el menor si y está cursando  1° año de bachillerato.

Manuel se dedica a los trabajos agrícolas desde que tenía 13 años, él ayudaba a su padre con los cultivos, luego su padre falleció y le heredó dos hectáreas de tierra las cuales hoy en día son cultivadas por él, además se dedica a la compra de ganado de repasto.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar ganado de repasto, tiene planeado comprar tres reces para alimentarlas y luego venderlas.

Su sueño es seguir trabajando en la agricultura y crianza de ganado.
texts.en:
Manuel is 52 years old, and has no level of academic schooling since his parents didn't give him the opportunity to study. Currently he is in a common-law marriage and has three children. Of his children, two of them no longer live with him, but the youngest does and is studying in the first year of high school.

Manuel has worked in agricultural jobs since he was 13 years old. He used to help his father with the crops, and after his father passed away he inherited two hectares of land which he farms today. He also works in the raising of grazing cattle.

He is requesting the loan to buy grazing cattle. He plans on buying three head of cattle to feed them, and later to sell them. His dream is to keep working in agriculture and cattle raising.

loans.use: to buy grazing cattle.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is 41 years old and married, and she has four children, two of whom are in school. Arlene works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan in order to purchase more groceries and firewood to sell. Arlene has borrowed and repaid eleven loans from NWTF, before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years, and she earns additional income from firewood sales.

Arlene aspires to save enough money so she could continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries and firewood to sell.

loans.name: Chheng

texts.en:
Chheng is 23 years old, a staff member at an electricity company, and a student at university. He lives with his farmer parents, in Kampong Cham province, Cambodia.

Being a staff member, Chheng can earn approximately $6 daily. Because of a lack of financial support, he would like to request a loan to pay his tuition fees for three years. This loan will help him graduate. In the future, he wants to have a bigger house.

loans.use: to pay his tuition fees.

loans.name: Melinda

texts.en:
Melinda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for six years.

Melinda requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

In the future, Melinda would like to save money, to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Maribeth

texts.en:
Maribeth is a married woman and has five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She is 42 years old, and four of her children are currently in school.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines. Maribeth requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF. She will use it to purchase ingredients for her food preparation business, like vegetables, cooking oil, rice, spices, and meat.

Maribeth has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food preparation business, like vegetables, spices, and meat.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is a married woman, with two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She is 37 years old, and both of her children are in school.

She has a general store business in the Philippines. Gina requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF. She will use the loan in order to purchase more items to sell, like soft drinks, soap, diapers, bread, and other groceries.

Gina has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell, like diapers, bread, and other groceries.

loans.name: Bevelyn

texts.en:
Bevelyn is 54 years old and married with nine children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  

Bevelyn has a business making and selling native mats in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy raw materials for her native mats.

Bevelyn has been in this business for seven years. In the future, Bevelyn would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her native mats

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a direct selling of personal collection products business in the Philippines.

Nilda requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more products from the personal collection to sell to her customers.

She has been in this business for six years now.

Nilda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more personal collection products to sell to her customers

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is a hardworking entrepreneur from Pasay, Philippines. She is 51 years old and has children. Wilfredo, her husband, works as a driver. She oversees the operation of their Jeepney unit and her income from the business is helping with their everyday needs and expenditures.

She has a one unit (14-16 person capacity) Jeepney, from which she is paid a *boundary (daily quota) each day. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 1,500 every day. Curiously, Jeepneys have purely American origins. They were first used by American soldiers helping the Philippines throw off the invading Japanese. Filipino ingenuity, however, managed to see this vehicle as an opportunity to earn, and modified the Jeep into a 20-seater Jeepney, open enough to provide adequate ventilation, sturdy for every day travel, and cheap enough to buy and maintain. Now, the Jeepneys are one of the things that makes the Philippines truly Philippine.

*In the boundary system, the driver pays the Jeepney owner a fixed amount (the “boundary”) for driving a passenger vehicle for 12 hours. It is as if the driver is renting the vehicle. What he earns from passenger fares above the “boundary,” minus what he paid for the gas and oil, is his take-home pay.

Carmelita is requesting a PHP 50,000 loan to buy spare parts and for the maintenance of her Jeepney unit. She will use the profit to improve the general living conditions of her family.

In the future, she wants another Jeepney unit to be used for their business operation. She hopes to have their own house so they don't need to rent anymore. She meets up with her co-fellowship** members to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

** All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for spare parts and maintenance of their jeepney unit.

loans.name: Judita

texts.en: Judita has been involved in business activities since 2006. She started with her own working capital of $400. She has a kiosk in her house and she wants to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as eggs, biscuits, cooking oil, noodles, coffee, sugar and other things to sell Including soft drinks, so she is requesting a loan of $1,500 from Tuba Rai Metin. She is taking a loan from Tuba Rai Metin because she hopes to run a bigger store in the future. She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin  so she will have more working capital to buy more goods.

loans.use: To buy eggs, biscuits, cooking oil, noodles, coffee, sugar and other things to sell Including soft drinks.

loans.name: Clenor

texts.en:
Clenor is 25 years old and married with one child.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Clenor has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and earns additional income from raising livestock.

Clenor aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Yi's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area in Sithor Kandal District, Prey Veng Province, Yi is 35 years old. She is a mother of four children, two of whom are in school, while another two are too young. She struggles to feed her family through rice cropping and working for others for a fee. She can earn income of about 29,200 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. 

This is first time for Yi with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is leading her group of two members to get a new loan. As a leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy chickens to raise and chicken feed in order to earn additional income for her family. She hopes to fatten her chickens so as to sell them for a good price.

loans.use: to buy chickens to raise and chicken feed

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
Riza is 45 years old and married with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Riza has a buying and selling of frozen foods business in the Philippines. Riza requested an 11,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan amount through NWTF to buy more frozen foods to sell.

Riza has been in this business for seven years. Riza would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more frozen foods to sell

loans.name: Edevie

texts.en:
Edevie is 40 years old and has three children. Edevie is married and all three children are in school.

Edevie is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Edevie requested a 5,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF in order to buy more livestock to offer for sale. Edevie has been raising livestock for two years.

In the future, Edevie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more livestock to offer for sale.

loans.name: Edwina

texts.en:
Edwina is 49 years old and married with one child in school.

Edwina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 16,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Edwina has borrowed and repaid 12 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns an income from clothing sales.

Edwina aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Enriquita

texts.en:
Enriquita is 59 years old and married with eight children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Enriquita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 5,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, snack foods, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future, Enriquita would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Roxana Del Carmen

texts.es:
Roxana de 47 años de edad se dedica a la venta de antojitos tales como enchilada, tamales, atol, etc. Tiene 10 años de dedicarse a este negocio, aprendio con su hermana, ya que anteriormente se dedicaba a vender verduras   estudio hasta  sexto grado. 

Gracias al trabajo duro que realiza ha logrado sacar con esfuerzo y sacrificio adelante a su hija de 17 años de edad, ques cursa bachillerato. Roxana es madre soltera.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es  para comprar un carro pequeño de segunda mano de uso, para poder transportarse a vender estos productos ya que hoy en día lo hace caminando y tiene que desplazarse a grandes distancias a pie para comercializarlo.

Los sueños a futuro es que su hija se supere y estudie una carrera universitaria  y con las ganancias obtenidas ampliar más su negocio para mejorar su ingreso y cambiar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
47-year-old Roxana makes a living by selling snacks, such as enchiladas, tamales, and atol [maize-based drink]. She has been in this business for ten years. She learnt it with her sister, since previously she made a living by selling vegetables. She studied up until the sixth grade.

Thanks to the hard work that she does, and with a lot of effort and sacrifice, she has managed to look after her 17-year-old daughter, who is doing her high school diploma. Roxana is a single mother.

The loan she is requesting is for buying a small second-hand car so she can transport her products to the place of sale, since at the moment she does this by walking and she has to travel great distances on foot in order to sell her products.

Her dreams for the future are that her daughter gets ahead in life and studies towards a university degree, and that she can expand her business with the profits she obtains in order to improve her earnings and change her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a small second-hand car in order to transport her products

loans.name: Sara Noemi

texts.es:
Sara de 26 años de edad, es una mujer luchadora que desde muy pequeña le ha gustado trabajar, estudió segundo año de bachillerato, está acompañada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, tiene un niño que estudia en kínder. 
Sara se dedica a los oficios domésticos, además trabaja en una tienda como empleada, la distancia del trabajo es de 12 kilómetros y viaja en bus
Ella con el crédito va a comprar 8 cerdos para engordarlos y venderlos para obtener ganancias.

Su sueño es seguir trabajando con la institución para tener un buen negocio.
texts.en:
Sara is 26 years old and a plucky woman who, since she was a girl, has liked to work. She studied up to the second year of high school. Sara is married; her husband works in farming. The couple has a son who is in kindergarten.

Sara takes care of the household chores and also works in a shop 12 kilometres from her home; she arrives there by bus.

Sara will use this loan to buy eight pigs to fatten up and sell for a profit.

Sara's dream is to continue working with the loan institution in order to have a good business.

loans.use: to buy eight pigs to fatten up and sell for a profit.

loans.name: Neydi Emeli

texts.es:
Neydi de 27 años de edad, solo estudió hasta sexto grado ya que sus padres no tenían lo suficientes recursos económicos para darle el estudio, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y tiene dos hijos que aún no asisten a la escuela.

Neydi se dedica al negocio de antojitos, todos los  días por las tardes ella sale a venderlos, el negocio lo aprendió con su madre desde pequeña, su horario de venta es de 3:00  a 6:00 PM.

El crédito lo necesita para mejorar su vivienda y para poder comprar más  producto para su negocio.

Sus sueños son seguir adelante con el negocio, tener una mejor calidad de vida y que sus hijos sean profesionales de éxito.
texts.en:
Neydi is 27 years old and only has a sixth grade education as her parents did not have enough money to pay for her schooling. Neydi's husband works in farming. The couple has two children who are not yet attending school.

Neydi has a business selling snacks. Every afternoon she goes out to sell her products. Neydi learned her trade from her mother from a young age. Neydi sells her snacks between 3pm and 6pm.

Neydi needs this loan in order to make improvements to her home and to buy more goods for her business.

Neydi's dreams are to continue moving forward, to have a better quality of life, and for her children to be successful professionals.

loans.use: to make improvements to her home and to buy more goods for her business.

loans.name: Dolores Cruz

texts.es: Dolores de 39 años de edad se dedica a la venta de granos básicos desde hace varios años, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda repellando las paredes de su casa asi como muestra en la fotografía, pero con lo que vende no le alcanza por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, y pago de mano de obra para poder mejorar su casa y vivir mas cómodos con su familia.
texts.en: 39-year-old Dolores has been selling staple grains for several years. With the money from the sales, she manages to settle some of her household expenses. She lives with her family in her own house. She wants to improve her home by plastering the walls of her house, as shown in the photograph, but she cannot manage this with the profits from her sales. For this reason, she is requesting a loan in order to buy cement and sand and to pay workers so she can improve her house and live more comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand, and to pay workers

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es:
Alba de 31 años de edad, es madre de tres hijos, hace un mes dio a luz a su tercer hijo, ella se siente bendecida,  no pudo culminar sus estudios pero eso no era motivo para no superarse, Alba se ha dedicado a ayudarle a su pareja en las siembras agrícolas y juntos tratan la manera de superarse para lograr el futuros de sus hijos.

 Alba queda al pendiente de los oficios del hogar y de la milpa, los ingresos provienen mas que todo del trabajo de su pareja.

El préstamo lo necesita para hacerle un ajuste al motor del carro ya que le está fallando y necesita enviarlo al taller lo mas pronto.
 Su sueño es que sus hijos crezcan sanos, darles estudio y que se superen en la vida.
texts.en:
31-year-old Alba is the mother of three children. She gave birth to her third child a month ago. She feels blessed. She was not able to finish her studies but this was not a reason not to get ahead in life. Alba has been dedicated to helping her partner to plant their crops and together they try to get ahead in life in order to secure the futures of their children.

Alba does the household work and works in the maize field. The earnings come mostly from the work of her partner.

She needs the loan in order to get her car’s motor fixed since it is not working and she needs to send it to the workshop as soon as possible.

Her dream is that her children grow up to be healthy, that they study and that they get ahead in life.

loans.use: to get her car's motor fixed since it is not working and she needs to send it to the workshop as soon as possible

loans.name: Francisco Balmore

texts.es:
Francisco de 21 años de edad, de profesión pescador. Actualmente casado es padre de un niño de 3 años de edad. Francisco alcanzo un nivel educativo de hasta 6º grado, debido a las dificultades económicas no pudo seguir estudiando ademas tenia que ayudarle a su familia con los gastos del hogar, él hoy en día esta acompañado y su esposa se dedica a vender el pescado que Francisco pesca.

Francisco ademas de la pesca también se dedica a la agricultura, aprendió todo esto gracias a su padre quien desde muy pequeño le enseño a luchar y a salir adelante.

La pesca la realiza en las aguas de una laguna que esta ubicada muy cerca de su hogar, en ella se interna por varias horas. El Horario que utiliza muchas veces es de todo el día.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar una motocicleta, ya que la pesca ha aumentado al igual que su clientela y con la compra de la motocicleta le permitirá salir a vender a él también en algunas comunidades  aledaños a su lugar de residencia.

Francisco a futuro desea tener todo lo indispensable para su familia, ademas dentro de sus planes esta hacer jaulas con redes en una parte de la laguna poder cultivar ahí los peces para vender y de esta forma facilitara el trabajo, ademas esto permitirá tener mas peces en la laguna. De las ganancias obtenidas el espera ir poco a poco salir adelante.
texts.en:
21-year-old Francisco is a fisherman. He is currently married and is the father of a three-year-old boy. Francisco studied up until the end of the sixth grade. Due to economic difficulties, he was not able to continue studying. He also had to help his family with the household expenses. Now he is married and his wife makes a living by selling the fish that Francisco catches.

Francisco also works in agriculture. He learnt everything thanks to his father, who taught him to fight and get ahead in life when he was little.

The loan he is requesting is for buying a motorcycle, since both the amount of fish he catches and his clientele has increased. By buying the motorcycle, he will be able to sell his fish in some neighbouring communities as well as in his own community.

In the future, Francisco wishes to have everything that his family needs. He also plans to make net cages in a part of the lagoon in order to be able to farm the fish he sells and, in this way, facilitate his work. This will also allow him to have many fish in the lagoon. With the profits he obtains, he hopes to keep getting ahead in life a little at a time.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle and go out into the communities to sell his fish

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es: Blanca de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la especialización de uñas acrílicas, tiene 1 año de dedicarse a ese trabajo y le ha ido muy bien, con su trabajo logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más productos como: paquetes de uñas acrílicas, esmaltes de colores, acetona, limas, algodón, entre otros y así continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Blanca is 31 years of age and lives in her own home with her partner and three children. She specialises in acrylic nails and has spent one year in this line work. It has gone very well for her and her job has allowed her to pay the household bills. 

Blanca is applying for a loan to purchase more products such as packets of acrylic nails, coloured nail polish, acetone, nail files, cotton balls and other items so she can continue to make a good income from her job.

loans.use: to buy packets of acrylic nails, coloured nail polish, acetone, nail files, cotton balls and other items so she can continue to make a good income from her job.

loans.name: Zulaykho

texts.ru: Зулайхо молодая и целеустремленная девушка. Ей 19 лет. Она является студенткой 2 курса Педагогического Университета Таджикистана по специальности преподаватель английского языка. Она учится успешно и получает отличные оценки. Зулайхо живет вместе со своими родителями. Ее родители очень гордятся, что у них такая умная дочь. Зулайхо хочет работать после окончания университета в школе, где она сама училась, и учить маленьких детей английскому языку. Она данное время нуждается финансовой поддержке, чтобы оплатить за учебный договор. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Zulaykho is a goal-oriented young woman.  She is 19 years old and a second-year student at the Pedagogic University of Tajikistan where she is studying to become an English language teacher.  She is a successful student and receives excellent grades.  Zulaykho lives with her parents who are very proud to have such a talented daughter.  After graduating from the university, Zulaykho wants to teach young children in the same school where she herself once studied.

At the present time, Zulaykho needs financial support to pay her tuition.  She is relying on your kindness and compassion.

loans.use: to pay her tuition

loans.name: Sozhida

texts.ru: Сожида добрая женщина. Она родилась в 1964 году. Сожида замужем и имеет 3 детей. Ее муж работает в автостоянке. Они все вместе живут в Северной части горного Таджикистана. Сожида занимается предоставлением услуги портнихи. Она этим бизнесом занимается уже более 25 лет и имеет большого опыта в данной сфере. Сожида имеет постоянных клиентов. Она также имеет много учеников. Она в основном обучает девочек своего кишлака своим ремеслом. Сожида имеет свой цех близи дома. Она планирует отремонтировать свой цех, так как ее цех в плохом состоянии. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 7500 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как краски, цемент и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Sozhida is kind woman.  She was born in 1964, is married, and has three children.  Her husband works in a vehicle parking lot.  They all live together in the northern part of mountainous Tajikistan. Sozhida is business as a seamstress.  She has been in this business for over 25 years and has a great deal of experience in this field.  She has regular clients as well as many apprentices.  Primarily her apprentices are young women from her native village.

Sozhida's workshop is not far from her home and she has been planning to repair it since it is in poor condition.  She is requesting a loan of 7,500 somoni to buy building materials such as paint, cement, etc.  She is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy building materials for repairing her workshop

loans.name: Mahbuza

texts.ru: Махбуза, 42 года, замужем, мать 2 сыновей. По характеру Махбуза очень добрая, веселая, трудолюбивая и целеустремленная женщина. В качестве основного источника дохода для семьи, она занимается изготовлением мягкой мебели, кроватей, чехлов, подушек и одеял, также приданного для невест. Начав свой бизнес 10 лет назад, на сегодняшний день у Махбузы развитая деятельность, наработаны постоянные клиенты, работает три швеи. Ее ежемесячный доход составляет 50,000 сом (KGS).  В целях дальнейшего развития ее бизнеса, Махбуза обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 500 долларов США (USD) на покупку большой специализированной швейной машинки. Доходы от кредита Махбуза планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса, в будущем она хочет приобрести грузовой автомобиль для того, чтобы развозить изготовленную мягкую мебель.
texts.en:
Mahbuza is 42 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  She is a very kind, happy, hard working, and goal-oriented woman.  Her family's primary income is from Mahbuza's business of making upholstered furniture, beds, slip covers, pillows, blankets, and dowry goods.  Mahbuza started her business 10 years ago and today she has a well-developed business with regular clients and she employs three seamstresses.  Her monthly income amounts to 50,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to developing her business further, Mahbuza applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of $500 (USD) to buy a large, specialized sewing machine.  Mahbuza plans to invest the additional profits she earns in further growth of her business, and to eventually buy a vehicle for delivering her upholstered furniture.

loans.use: to purchase sewing machine for furniture production

loans.name: Zilola

texts.ru: Зилола молодая и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 24 года. Она замужем. Ее муж Фируз. Они воспитывают 2 детей. Сыну Фаридуну 5 лет, а дочке Нозие 2 года. Зилола старается обеспечить своих детей хорошим условием проживания. Она более чем 5 лет занимается купле продажей продуктов питания. Она имеет свой продуктовый магазин. Зилола продает все выды продуктов питания как колбасные изделия, консервы, конфеты, макароны, овощи, фрукты, молочные продукты и т.п. Ее магазин находится в центральном рынке. Она планирует расширить ассортимент товара и таким образом привлечь покупателей, так как конкуренция очень большая. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки продуктов питания. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Zilola is a hard working young woman.  She is 24 years old and married.  She and her husband, Firuz, have two children.  Her son Faridun is five and her daughter Nozia is two.  Zilola tries to provide her children with a good standard of living.

For over five years Zolila has been in the grocery business.  She has her own store located in the central market where she sells all sorts of groceries including sausages, canned goods, candy, pasta, fruits, vegetables, dairy products, and so forth.

Since there is a lot of competition, Zolila is planning to increase the variety of her goods to attract more customers.  She is requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni to buy grocery products and she is relying on your kindness and compassion.

loans.use: to buy food items for increasing working capital

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is 46 years old, married and has four children. One of her children is in school.

Juliet is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP9,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Juliet would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Насиба ответственная женщина. Она в ИМОНе кредитуется впервые. Насиба с детства имела большой интерес шитью женской одежды. Она научилась у портнихи шитью женской одежды и 20 лет назад начала свой самостоятельный бизнес шитьем женской одежды. Она этим бизнесом занимается более чем 20 леи и имеет большой опыт в данной сфере. Она шьет национальные женские платья у себя дома. Насиба хочет купить стол и стулья для своего цеха. Она таким образом улучшить условию работы и будет развевать бизнес. С полученного дохода она создаст условия для образования для своих 5 детей. Насиба запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США для покупки столов и стульев. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Nasiba is a responsible woman. This is her first time taking out a loan from IMON International.   Since her childhood, Nasiba has had a great interest in making women's clothing and 20 years ago she started her own sewing business.  She has been in this field for over 20 years and has great deal of experience.  Nasiba works from home making traditional women's clothing.

She wants to buy tables and chairs for her workshop to make her working conditions better and to help develop her business.  With the additional income, she will be able to provide her five children with educations.  Nasiba is requesting a loan of $1,000 (USD) to buy tables and chairs.  She is relying on your kindness and compassion.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs for her workshop

loans.name: Safarmo

texts.ru: Сафармо замужем и имеет 4 не совершеннолетних детей. Она живет и работает в столице своей страны. Сафармо 5 лет назад начала свой бизнес купле продажей продуктов питания. Она имеет свой продуктовый магазин. Сафармо покупает оптом и реализует в розницу. Ее муж помогает ей введению бизнеса. Сафармо обратилась за займом в сумме 5000 сомони для покупки продуктов питания, чтобы увеличить оборотный капитал. Она будет использовать полученный доход для образования детей. Сафармо ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Safarmo is married and has four young children. She lives and works in her country's capital city.  Five years ago, Safarmo started her own grocery business and has her own store.  She buys her goods at wholesale and sells them at retail.  Her husband helps her to run the business.

Saramo applied for a loan of 5,000 somoni (TJS) to buy food products in order to increase her working capital.  She plans to use the additional income for her children's education.  Safarmo is relying on your kindness and compassion.

loans.use: to buy food items for increasing working capital

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнуре 42 года, замужем, 3 детей, образование среднее, она очень ответственная и трудолюбивая. С 1990 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, на сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Айнуры есть 2 коровы, 1 теленок и 5 овец. Также на 0,30 ГА собственной земли она выращивает картофель. Айнура знает технологию ведения сельскохозяйственной деятельности и умеет вкладывать средства по назначению. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, часть средств будет потрачена на покупку корма для скота. Айнура намерена доходы от кредита направить на дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Ainura is 42 years old, married and has three children.  She has a secondary-level education and she is a very responsible and hard working woman. Since 1990 she has been in the cattle and farming business, and today Ainura has two cows, a calf, and five sheep.  She also has 0.3 ha of land where she grows potatoes.  She is good at running her business and knows how to invest funds where they are needed.  

With the goal of further developing her business, Ainura applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy cattle, with a portion of the funds going to buy livestock feed.  She intends to use the profits from the loan for future growth of her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional cattle and livestock feed

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
Maria es una joven mujer de 20 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene un hijo de dos años de edad, y una bebe de nueve meses, su negocio es la venta de artículos de ferretería.
Ella es buena madre, constante, independiente, luchadora, trabajadora y muy responsable. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ’16 de julio’ un sitio caracterizado por el creciente comercio en todas las áreas.
Maria es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello largo negro trenzado, su vestir es típico (sombrero, manta y pollera), su lengua materna es el aymara y también habla el español pues sus clientes manejan las dos lenguas. Su vida la comparte con su pareja y sus dos pequeños hijos, vive en casa de un familiar y no cuenta con agua en su domicilio, todos los vecinos comparten un distribuidor de agua público. Ella comenzó en este negocio porque sus cuñados son constructores y le aconsejaron que este rubro sería rentable dado el crecimiento de la zona. Ella sueña con tener una tienda surtida con todo tipo de productos para mejorar sus ingresos económicos y darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus pequeños hijitos. Su deseo es incrementar su mercadería realizando la compra de calaminas por quintal.
Es por esos motivos que Maria solicita un préstamo para la compra de calaminas por quintal y con los beneficios mejorar la vida de sus hijitos.
texts.en:
Maria is a young woman of only 20 years old. She lives with her spouse and has a two year old son and a nine month old baby. She works in hardware sales. She is a good mother, consistent, independent, a fighter, hardworking, and very responsible. Her business is located in an area called "16 de julio," which is known for its growing commercial sales.

Maria has a dark complexion, a medium build, and long black braided hair. Her clothing is traditional (a sombrero, poncho, and skirt). Her native language is Aymara, though she also speaks Spanish. Her customers use both languages. She shares her life with her spouse and two young children; they live in a family home, which doesn't have running water (all the neighbors share a public water distributary). 

She began her business because her brother in law is in construction and advised her that this sector would be profitable because of the recent growth in her area. She hopes to have a stocked store with every kind of product in order to better her economic income and provide a better quality of life to her young children. Her desire is to increase the amount of merchandise she has by purchasing corrugated metal sheets. That is why she is asking for this loan: she wants to buy corrugated metal sheets, and with the profit, improve the life of her kids.

loans.use: to buy corrugated metal sheets, and use the profit to improve her children's lives.

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru: Фируза трудолюбивая девушка. ЕЙ 23 года. Она не замужем и живет с родителями и сестрами. Фируза учится в 4 курсе Медицинского Университета Таджикистана. Она учится успешно и после занятий работает в магазине продавщицей. Фируза и ее семья живут бедно. Она верит в то что после окончания университета она будет высококвалифицированным специалистом и будет служить своему народу. Фируза обратилась за займом в сумме 1400 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Firuza is a hard working young woman.  She is 23 years old, unmarried, and lives with her parents and sisters.  Firuza is a fourth-year student at the Medical University of Tajikistan.  She is a successful student, and after her classes, she works in a store as a salesperson.  

Firuza and her family are poor, but she believes that once she graduates, she will be a highly qualified professional who will serve her fellow countrymen.  She has applied for a loan of $1,400 (USD) to pay her tuition. She is relying on your kindness and compassion.

loans.use: to pay herr tuition

loans.name: Parviz

texts.ru: Парвизу 18 лет. Он женат. Его жена домохозяйка. Парвиз отлично учился в школе и после окончания средней школы он поступил в Таджикский Государственный Университет  Коммерции в факультет Финансы и кредит. Он учится отлично. Парвиз должен оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Parviz is 18 years old and married.  His wife is a homemaker.  Parviz was an excellent student and after graduating from secondary school, he entered the Department of Finance and Credit at the Tajik State University.  He earns excellent grades.

Parviz needs to pay his tuition, but he doesn't have the money.  He is requesting a loan for paying his tuition and he is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to pay his tuition

loans.name: Aisalkyn

texts.ru: Айсалкын 23 года, замужем, есть сын. У Айсалкын среднее образование, уже год она занимается земледелием, в качестве стартового капитала у нее было всего 6,000 сомов (KGS). Сегодня в хозяйстве Айсалкын есть земельный участок, где она выращивает малину, яблони, помидоры, картошку и перец, которые реализует на местном рынке. Экологически чистые и вкусные продукты пользуются большим спросом. Ее  ежемесячный доход составляет в среднем 12,000 сомов (KGS). Айсалкын обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS), на который она купит 100-150 кг. малины и 400-500 кг. яблок по оптовой цене для перепродажи. Доходы от кредита позволят Айсалкын увеличить ее доходы и улучшить материальное состояние семьи.
texts.en:
Aisalkyn is  23 years old, married, and has a son.  Aisalkyn has a secondary-level education and for a year now she has been in the farming business.  Her starting capital was only 6,000 som (KGS), but today Aisalkyn has a plot of land where she grows raspberries, apples, tomatoes, potatoes, and peppers, which she sells at the local market where there is a strong demand for her ecologically friendly and tasty produce.  Her monthly income averages 12,000 som (KGS).

Aisalkyn applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) to buy 100-150 kg of raspberries and 400-500 kg of apples at wholesale prices for retail sale.  The profits will allow Aisalkyn to increase her income and improve her family's material well-being.

loans.use: to purchase raspberries and apples for resale

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Madame Yawa vit avec son conjoint proviseur et leurs enfants à Lomé. Pour venir en aide à son conjoint, elle a démarré la vente des chaussures et quelques produits alimentaires à domicile depuis 2007. A son second prêt, Yawa espère acheter des marchandises afin de satisfaire les clients. Elle souhaite créer une seconde boutique et assurer une meilleure éducation à ses enfants.
texts.en: Yawa lives in Lomé with her husband, who is a school principal, and their children. In order to help her husband, she began selling shoes and some groceries from her home in 2007. She is on her second loan and is hoping to buy goods to satisfy customer demand. She would like to set up a second shop and provide for a better education for her children.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is a 52-year-old married woman and a mother of three children from Concepcion, Iloilo. Editha has  been engaged in a fishing business with her husband for several years now. Fishing has given them the income that they need.

Editha is asking for a loan to buy a new fishing boat. Through this, her husband will be able to improve his catch, thus giving them more fish to sell in the market. 

In the future, she hopes to make their fishing business a success, and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy a new fishing boat

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita is single and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Margarita requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more items like soap, snack foods, canned goods and other groceries. She has been in this business for two years.

In the future, Margarita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like soap, snack foods, canned goods and other groceries.

loans.name: Osvaldo Manuel

texts.es:
Oswaldo junto con su esposa creo un sostenible núcleo de trabajo familiar donde los dos mantienen sus cultivos pues son agricultores de nacimiento con una experiencia bárbara de 30 años. 
Tiene 4 hijos de 21, 10, 18, y a 8 años de edad y su mayor orgullo es saber que los 4 se encuentran estudiando buscando ser grandes profesionales en el área que deseen estudiar y se siente muy tranquilos al saber que cuentan con un padre que trabaja 12 horas diarias pro su beneficio. 
Oswaldo solicita un crédito que invertirá en la compra de insumos para mantener las tierras y fertilizantes y riegos para iniciar cosecha. 
Su mayor aspiración es poder legalizar su parcela de cultivo un tema que lo toca en lo profundo de su alma pues puede haber la posibilidad que pierda las tierras que han pertenecido a su familia pro tantas generaciones
texts.en:
Oswaldo and his wife have created a sustainable, familial working environment, where they both maintain their crops (they have been farmers from birth, with experience of over 30 years). They have four children, aged 21, 18, 10, and 8, and their biggest pride is in knowing that the four of them are studying to be great professionals in any area they choose to study, and that they feel safe and calm knowing they can count on their father to work 12 hours daily for their benefit.

Oswaldo is asking for this loan to invest in the purchase of supplies to maintain his land, and fertilizers / irrigation supplies to begin planting. His biggest aspiration is to be able to legalize his plot of land. This is something very close to his soul, because there is the possibility that he will lose the land that has belonged to his family for many generations.

loans.use: to buy supplies to maintain and prepare his land, such as fertilizer, irrigation supplies, and pest fumigants.

loans.name: Wendy Nathalie

texts.es:
Wendy tiene 25 años de edad, estudió hasta 3° año de bachillerato, está casada y su esposo trabaja en un carwash, tiene una niña de 4 años de edad que está estudiando kinder.

Ella se dedica a los oficios domésticos, también le ayuda al esposo en la administración del carwash, ella está en este trabajo ya que el papá es el dueño del negocio, trabaja todos los días de 6:00 de la mañana a 6:00 de la tarde.

Ella necesita el crédito para realizar exámenes médicos a su pequeña hija que está mal de salud.

Su  sueño es que Dios le ayude a su pequeña para que pueda salir con bien de su salud.
texts.en:
Wendy is 25 years old. She is in the 3rd year of her Bachelor's. She is married, and her husband works at a car wash. They have one daughter who is four years old and is currently in kindergarten. She makes a living doing domestic work, and also helping her husband with the administrative tasks for the carwash. She will help with this work until he is able to be the boss at the business; she works everyday from 6 in the morning til 6 in the evening.

She needs the loan in order to afford medical exams for her young daughter, who is in bad health. She hopes that God will help her daughter to be in good health again.

loans.use: to purchase medical exams for her young daughter who is in bad health

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees for her daughter

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru: Эту талантливую женщину зовут Дилбар. Ей 43 года. Она жительница района Шахритус, где живет вместе со своей семьей. У нее двое сыновей и двое дочерей. Муж Дилбар работает в одном из городов Российской Федерации. Дилбар живет в районе с детьми и нигде не работает. Она хочет начать собственное дело и улучшить жизненные условия семьи. Дилбар умеет шить женские платья. Она хочет брать заказы, однако у нее нет своей швейной машинки. Дилбар имеет сбережение в размере 120 долларов США. Так как этой суммы недостаточно для покупки вышивальной машинки, она обратилась за кредитом. Дилбар надеется, что ей дадут шанс начать свое дело, она ожидает вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
This talented woman is named Dilbar.  She is 43 years old and she and her family live in the Shahrituz region.  She has two sons and two daughters.  Dilbar's husband works in a city in Russia.  She and the children live on the outskirts of town and she doesn't have a job.  She wants to start her own  business to improve her family's living conditions.  Dilbar knows how to sew women's dresses and she wants to be able to take orders, but she doesn't have a sewing machine.

Dilbar has $120 (USD) in savings, but this isn't enough to buy an embroidery machine so she has applied for a loan.  Dilbar hopes that she will be given the opportunity to start her own business and she is relying on your support.

loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine to start her own business

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.en:
Edilberto has been separated from his wife. He has four children who live with him in Zamboanga del Sur. To make a living, he operates a swine fattening business, and he has been doing this for 10 years. It helps his family a lot, and his efforts solely supported his children. 

He became a member of Gata Daku MPC and borrowed a loan to purchase feeding supplies for his piggery. 

After selling this pigs, he plans to buy more piglets for his business expansion.

loans.use: to purchase feeding supplies for his piggery

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is thankful for the financial assistance that was granted to her. She was able to utilize the loan to buy spare parts and accessories, and for the maintenance of their jeepney unit. Her earnings were a big help in their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 15,000 PHP loan for her to buy spare parts, and for the maintenance of their jeepney unit. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Gina dreams of having another unit of jeepney for additional income. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week, and this is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for the spare parts and maintenance of the jeepney unit.

loans.name: Asael Antonio

texts.es:
Asael es un comerciante que desde hace 5 años trabaja como independiente caminando por las calles empujando su carrito de helados, alegrando a los niños cada que toca su campana.
Asael es padre de nada menos que 7 hijos y los mantiene a ellos y a su pareja sin inconvenientes, bien es cierto que no tienen lujos o grandes cosas pero tienen alimento y una educación. 
Solicita un crédito para reformar su carrito de comidas que se encuentra en pésimo estado y comprar surtido de helado. 
Con el crédito mejorara las ventas pues tendrá una mejor apreciación de los clientes quienes lo esquivan pro el estado de su carro. 
El cliente siempre ha querido tener varios carros de helado, generar empleos y que toda la comunidad goce de una sabrosa nieve vendida por él.
texts.en:
Asael is a businessman who, for the past 5 years, has worked independently walking through the streets pushing his ice cream cart, making the children happy with every chime of his bell.

Asael is the father of no fewer than 7 children and he sustains them and his partner without problems. It's certain that they don't have any luxuries or big things but they have food and education.

He asks for a loan to make improvements on his food cart that is in terrible condition and to purchase a variety of ice cream.

With the loan, he will improve his sales since we will be appreciated more by the customers who avoid him because of his cart's condition.

The client always has wanted to have several ice cream carts, create jobs, and that the whole community enjoys the delicious ice cream sold by him.

loans.use: To make improvements on his ice cream cart since it is in very bad condition and purchase a variety of ice creams, to feed his 7 children.

loans.name: Tuzinduke Group

texts.fr:
Ancile  fait partie du groupe  Tuzinduke et  habite à  Bujumbura. Elle a 40 ans et est mariée à Gaspard, un commerçant. Ensemble ils ont 6 enfants âgés de 3 à 18 ans, tous étudient. Elle a sous sa charge 4 enfants membres de sa famille élargie qui étudient. 

Elle fait le commerce d'habits  de bébé depuis  7 ans. 

Elle est à  son huitième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup d’habits de bébé, à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  construire une maison, et voir ses  enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Ancile belongs to the Tuzinduke group and lives in Bujumbura. She is 40 years old and married to Gaspard, a trader. They have six children together, ranging from three to 18 years old in age; the children are all studying. She also has four other children who are part of her extended family in her care; they are studying too.

Ancile has been selling baby clothes for the past seven years and is on her eighth loan from Turame. With the Kiva loan she is granted she is going to increase her capital and buy a large quantity of baby clothes to resell, so she can earn more money. In the coming years she would like to build a house and see her chidlren through school.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy a large quantity of baby clothes to resell and make more money.

loans.name: Birashoboka Ii Group

texts.fr:
Digne fait partie du groupe  Birashoboka  II et  habite à  Bujumbura. Elle a 30 ans et est mariée à Aimé, un enseignant de l’école primaire. Ensemble ils ont 5 enfants âgés de 2 à 16 ans, dont  4 étudient.
Elle a sous sa charge 1 enfant membre de sa famille élargie qui étudie. 

Elle fait le commerce de boutique (bière, cahiers,…) depuis  10 ans. 

Elle est son troisième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de  cahiers à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  construire une maison, et voir se enfants étudient.
texts.en:
Digne belongs to the Birashoboka II group and lives in Bujumbura. She is 30 years old and married to Aimé, who is a primary school teacher. They have five children together, whose ages range from two to 16 years old; four of them are at school. She has another child in her care, who is a member of her extended family and also at school.

Digne has been running a shop business (selling beer, exercise books..) for the past ten years and is on her third loan from Turame. With the Kiva loan she is granted she is going to increase her capital and buy a large quantity of exercise books to resell, so she can earn more money. In the coming years she would like to build a house and see her children through school.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy a large number of exercise books to resell so she can make more money.

loans.name: Clara Elizabeth

texts.es:
Clara es una joven de 20 años de edad, estudió hasta 9° grado, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja en un taller donde reparan camiones de carga pesada, tiene dos hijos, uno de 3 años y la otra de 6 meses de edad, de ella dependen únicamente sus hijos.

Clara se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos desde que tenía 14 años, y la mayor parte de sus ingresos dependen del trabajo que realiza su esposo.

El crédito lo utilizará para comprar una caja de herramientas que su esposo ocupa para trabajar en el taller de reparación de camiones.

Su sueño es que sus hijos crezcan, que sean unas personas de bien, que Dios les dé salud a su pareja para poder seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Clara is a young 20 year old woman. She studied until grade 9. She is married, and her husband works in a workshop where they repair freight trucks. She has two children, one is 3 years old and the other is 6 months old, and they depend on her.

Clara has made a living in domestic work since she was 14 years old, but the better part of the family income depends on the work that her husband performs. The loan will be used to buy a toolbox, which her husband can take to the work shop to repair trucks. Her dream is that her children will grow and be good people, and that God will give good health to her husband to be able to continue his work.

loans.use: to buy a toolbox, which her husband can take to work at a workshop to repair trucks.

loans.name: Saul Rimber

texts.es:
Saul es un hombre de 27 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos y su negocio es el encuadernado de libros.
Él es inteligente, emprendedor, dedicado, paciente, perfeccionista, responsable y trabajador. Su labor la realiza en la zona ‘villa Franz Tamayo’ una zona residencial que después de 20 años recién obtuvo acceso a agua potable.
Saul es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello corto negro, su lengua materna es el aymara el cual utiliza con sus familiares, para el comercio habla español. Inicio su negocio propio hace un año, después de haber trabajado cuatro años como ayudante, en su anterior trabajo conoció a muchas personas que ahora son sus clientes. Su vida la realiza en casa de sus padres y la comparte con su papá, mamá y hermano que trabaja como transportista, su padre se encuentra constantemente de viaje. Su sueño es tener una tienda céntrica dedicada únicamente al encuadernado de libros. Su negocio tiene necesidades como; guillotinas para cortar papel, prensas, reglas, escuadras, etc. El desea realizar la compra de herramientas para su negocio y de esa manera prosperar en su rubro.
Es por esos motivos que Saul solicita un préstamo para compra de una guillotina, una prensa y demás herramientas necesarias para su negocio.
texts.en:
Saul is a 27-year-old man, single, without children, and his business is bookbinding. 

He is intelligent, enterprising, determined, patient, perfectionist, responsible and hard-working. He does his work in the "Villa Franz Tamayo" area, a residential area that just 20 years ago got access to drinking water.

Saul is tanned, of medium height, has short black hair, and his first language is Aymara, which he uses with his family, but in business he speaks Spanish.  He opened his own business a year ago, after having worked for 4 years as an assistant. In his previous job, he got to know many people who are now his customers.  His life takes place in his parents' house and he shares it with his dad, mom, and brother who works in transportation. His father is always travelling. His dream is to have a central store dedicated entirely to bookbinding. His business has some needs such as paper cutters to cut paper, presses, rulers, squares, etc. He wants to purchase the tools for his business and in this way prosper in his field.

For these reasons, Saul asks for a loan to purchase a paper cutter, a press, and other tools needed for his business.

loans.use: to purchase a paper cutter, a press, and other tools necessary for his business.

loans.name: Salomat

texts.ru: Саломат хороший врач, заботливая мать и жена. Ей 50 лет. Она уроженка района Чкаловска города Худжанд. На протяжении 5 лет Саломат работает семейным врачом в отделении первичной медико-санитарной помощи. Она любит свою профессию, ей нравится помогать людям и лечить их. Муж Саломат как и многие мужчины ее района является трудовым мигрантом. У Саломат двое детей. Дочери 23 года, она работает учительницей в местной школе. А сыну 22 года, он студент ВУЗа. Сейчас наступил период оплаты за учебного контракта сына в ВУЗе и Саломат не хватает для этой цели 1000 долларов США. Она узнала о выгодном кредите для образования и обратилась в ХУМО. Саломат очень надеется получить поддержку. Ее сыну очень важно окончить ВУЗ, так как он в будущем хочет стать высококвалифицированным специалистом и сделать карьеру в своей области.
texts.en:
Salomat is an excellent doctor and a caring mother and wife.  She is 50 years old and is a native of Khujan's Chkalov neighborhood.  For the last five years Salomat has been a family doctor in the primary care department.  She loves her profession because she likes helping people and making them healthy again.  Salomat's husband, like many men from their area, moved away to find work.  Salomat has two children.  Her 23 year old daughter is a teacher in a local school, and her 22 year old son is a student in an institute of higher education.

The time has come to pay her son's tuition, but Salomat doesn't have $1,000 (USD) for this purpose. She learned about MLO Humo and Partners' attractive loans and applied for one.  Salomat really hopes to receive this support.  It is very important that her son finish his education because he wants to become a highly qualified professional and start a good career in his field.

loans.use: to pay her son's annual higher education tuition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients to make pupusas, and to buy tables and chairs for her business.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es:
Alexander, se dispone a renovar su equipo de trabajo y solicita un nuevo préstamo para realizar la compra de máquinas de cortar cabello, gel, espejo entre otros materiales que le sean de utilidad para mantener la peluquería funcionando. 
Con la inversión del crédito anterior a mantenido un progreso constante en su situación económica y un negocio mejor equipado, sus clientes están satisfechos, las condiciones familiares se mantiene y cancelo su deuda.
texts.en:
Alexander is ready to update his work equipment and asks for a new loan to purchase clippers, gel, a mirror among other things that are needed and useful to maintain a functioning hair salon.

With the investment of the previous loan, he has maintained constant progress in his economic situation and has a better equipped business, his customers are satisfied, and he maintains his family situation and paid off his debt.

loans.use: to purchase hair clippers, gel, a mirror among other materials that are needed and useful to maintain a functioning hair salon.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María, utilizo el crédito anterior para ofrecer mayor variedad de productos en su negocio, actualmente sus ventas han incrementado un poco, sus nuevos ingresos son invertidos en cubrir las necesidades familiares y cancelación de su deuda.
Con el propósito de resurtir su negocio se ha decidido a solicitar un nuevo préstamo con el que comprara flores artificiales, variedad de ropa y accesorios, de esta manera continuara satisfaciendo a sus clientes.
texts.en:
María used the previous loan to offer a better variety of products in her business.  Currently, her sales have increased some; her new income is invested in paying for the things her family needs and paying off her debt.

With the goal to restock her business, she has decided to ask for another loan to purchase artificial flowers, and a variety of clothing and accessories so as to continue satisfying her customers.

loans.use: to purchase artificial flowers, and a variety of clothing and accessories, so as to continue satisfying her customers.

loans.name: Gilma

texts.es:
Gilma una mujer de 52 años de edad que tiene al cuidado sus tres hijos, a su madre y a su padre quien es discapacitado y requiere atenciones especiales es una granjera con muchos años de experiencia tiene gran sentido de pertenecía con los animales, se dedica al ganado bovino (producción de leche), también tiene pollos y cerdos. 
Solicita un crédito para la compra de una cría de vaca, comprar un cerdo, varios pollos y el cuido pertinentes para cada animal por lo que necesita una considerable suma de dinero puesto que tiene un elevado costo. 
Gilma tiene que trabajar y trabajar lo hace pro su padre discapacitado pro sus hijos por el bienestar de su familia y solo quiere tener recursos para comprar una finca y poblarla de animales.
texts.en:
Gilma is a 52-year-old woman who takes care of her three children, her mother, and her father who is disabled and requires special attention.  She is a farmer with many years of experience. She has a great sense of ownership for her animals. She works with cattle (dairy production), and also has chickens and pigs.

She asks for a loan to purchase a calf, purchase a pig, several chickens, and the associated feed for each animal, for which she needs a significant amount of money since it costs a lot. 

Gilma has to work and work, which she does for her disabled father, for her children, and for her family's well-being, and she just wants to have resources to purchase a farm and populate it with animals.

loans.use: to purchase a calf, a pig, chickens and feed for each of them. She needs to produce a lot to pay for the expenses of her disabled father.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 27 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica  a la crianza de pollos dese hace 2 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas pollos y profilaxis, para continuar con la crianza ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo.
texts.en: The young woman whose face has been pixelated because she is 27 years old and lives in a high risk area, has worked raising chickens for 2 years. She sells her products in the different markets that are near her house. She lives with her husband and their two children. She is asking for a loan to purchase more chickens and prophylaxis, to continue raising chickens since this is her only source of work.

loans.use: to purchase more chickens and prophylaxis.

loans.name: Ana Veliz

texts.es:
Ana, es casada, vive con su familia integrada por su esposo y cinco hijos, algunos de los cueles están estudiando; su negocio es la crianza de cerdos y siembra de granos básicos, la crianza de cerdos es una actividad fácil de desempeñar con ayuda de sus hijos mayores, además cuenta con un espacio apropiado, en cuanto al cultivo de granos básicos, es el complemento para tener recursos económicos con los que puede cubrir las necesidades de su familia, cuanta con mucha experiencia en el negocio y es apoyada  por su esposo.
Con el préstamo Ana comprara dos cerdos e insumos agrícolas para la milpa de postrera,  fortalecerá el negocio aprovechando que la venta de cerdos es favorable y dará un mejor trato a sus cultivos, sus expectativas son mejorar su situación económica.
Sus sueños son mantener su fuente de ingresos con vida, mejorar la  alimentación, educación y vestuario de su familia.
texts.en:
Ana is married, and lives with her family comprised of her husband and five children, some of whom are students. Her business is raising pigs and growing basic grains. Raising pigs is easy work to carry out with the help of her older children. In addition, she has an appropriate space where she grows basic grains, which is a complement to have economic resources with which she can pay for her family's necessities. She has a lot of experience in her business and is supported by her husband.

With the loan, Ana will purchase two pigs and agricultural supplies for the second harvest of her corn field, and will strengthen her business, taking advantage of a favorable sale of the pigs, and will give better care to her crops. Her expectation is to improve her economic situation.

Her dreams are to keep her source of income alive, and improve her family's food, education and clothing.

loans.use: to purchase two pigs and agricultural supplies for her second harvest of her corn field, to strengthen her business.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María de 48 años de edad,  se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su casa. Ella se creció con su abuela quien dedicó toda su vida a realizarse como comerciante ella era propietaria de una tienda que atendían todos los días por estar instalada en su casa de habitación, su abuela era una persona muy humilde y trabajadora y fue ella quien le enseño el trabajo de comerciante buenos principios.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su comunidad, también se dedica a los oficios domésticos como madre y esposa se preocupa por mantener su hogar lo más higiénico posible ya que su prioridad son su familia, esta labor la aprendió de su abuela quien dedicó toda su vida a realizar los oficios y ventas de productos básicos ella continua haciéndolo porque le enorgullece que su hijo se sientan cómodos y tenga lo necesario para su crecimiento. 


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, huevos, detergentes, etc. para surtir su negocio de productos básicos, ya que manifiesta que la tienda que estaba más cerca de la suya fue cerrada y la demanda de productos ha aumentado significativamente.

Las planes que ella tiene para un futuro son los de invertir el mayor tiempo que fuera posible en hacer crecer su negocio, terminar de pagar el préstamo y comprar un molino nixtamal para prestar servicio a su comunidad.
texts.en:
María, 48 years old, takes care of the household chores in her house. She grew up with her grandmother who worked her whole life as a business woman. She was the owner of a store that she ran every day because it was in their home. Her grandmother was a very humble and hard-working person and it was she that taught her to work as a businesswoman with good principles. 

She works selling staple products in her community. She also takes care of the household chores; as a mother and wife she makes sure to keep her home as clean as possible since her priority is her family. This work she learned from her grandmother who worked her entire life to take care of the chores and sell basic products. She continues doing this because it gives her pride that her children are comfortable and have everything necessary for their growth.   

The loan that she is requesting is to purchase rice, beans, sugar, milk, eggs, detergents, etc. to stock her business with staple products, since she states that the store that was closest to hers has closed and the demand for products has increased significantly. 

Her plans for the future are to invest as much time as possible in growing her business, pay off the loan, and purchase a corn flour mill to offer the service to her community.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, sugar, milk, eggs, detergents, etc. to stock her business of staple products.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Don carlos de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la venta de lotería lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas lotería por mayor para continuar con sus ventas ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Don Carlos, 59, lives in his own house with his wife. He sells lottery tickets on foot throughout the different communities near his place of residence.

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of more wholesale lottery tickets in order to continue with his sales, as this is his only means of employment.  

In this way he can have better earnings in order to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more wholesale lottery tickets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy: cement, sand, iron and wood to build a bathroom with shower in his house.

loans.name: Carlos Alirio

texts.es: Carlos  tiene 49 años de edad, es casado y tiene 4 hijos y una  nieta  que vive con Carlos, el  se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales, en esta ocasión va a invertir el crédito en la compra de fungicidas y abono para cuidar sus cultivos que tiene a medias con el dueño del terreno, su esposa se dedica  al jornal de trabajo en el campo,  Carlos es un señor de nacionalidad colombiana que se vino a Ecuador en busca de trabajo y dice que si lo encontró, por lo que aspira quedarse viviendo en Ecuador y agradece por el apoyo que se le da con el crédito.
texts.en:
Carlos is 49 years old and he is married. Carlos has four children and a granddaughter who lives with him. He devotes himself to agriculture and to raising animals.

On this occasion he is going to invest the loan in the purchase of fungicide and compost in order to care for his crops, half of which he gives to the owner of the land.  His wife works in the field by day.

Carlos is a Colombian national who came to Ecuador in search of employment; and he says that he did find it, so he wants to continue living in Ecuador. 

He is grateful for the support that the loan gives him.

loans.use: to purchase compost and fungicide.

loans.name: Edelma Modesta

texts.es:
Edelma Modesta se Llama la Joven que habita en el municipio de el Jicaral una ciudad donde la cultura de ser un buen ciudadano se mantiene. 

Edelma Modesta Es una joven de 21 años de edad no tiene hijos bajo su cargo solo cuenta con su mamita quien vive en la misma casa de habitación con ella, con lo poco que ella gana le ayuda a su mamita que tanto ama y estima. 

Desde hace 2 años ejerce el trabajo como Maestra de Educación Primaria, pero son de sus sueños llegar a mejorar las condiciones de su vida. 

Por medio de promoción de crédito por trabajadores de Ceprodel se dio cuenta quien era Kiva y que estos financiaban crédito por medio de Ceprodel, por lo que se vio la necesidad de solicitar un pequeño financiamiento para la compra de un tv de 21´´ esto le ayudaría mucho a ella por lo que después de un día cansada de su trabajo mejoraría mucho a relajarse viendo noticias en el país.  

Se siente agradecida con Dios por a verle iluminado que Kiva existía y que por medio de estas dos instituciones se le podrían cumplir todo sus sueños.
texts.en:
Edelma Modesta is the name of a young woman who lives in the town of El Jicaral in the city where the culture of being a good citizen still remains.

Edelma Modesta is a 21-year-old young woman with no kids under her care. She only has her mother who lives with her at the same house. With the small amount of money that she earns  she helps her mother, whom she loves and appreciates. 

For the last 2 years she has worked as an elementary school teacher, but her dream is to improve her living conditions.

Through the promotion of loans for workers of Ceprodel, she realized what Kiva was and that Ceprodel was financed by it. Then she decided to ask for a loan to buy a 21 inch TV. This would help her a lot, since she could relax watching the news after a hard day of work.

She is grateful to God because now she knows of the existence of Kiva and that with the help of both institutions all her dreams can come true.

loans.use: to buy a 21 inch TV.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre de 56 años de edad, soltero, padre de dos hijos de 17 y 6 años de edad, y su negocio es la confección de pantalones de hombre.
Él es independiente, constante, emprendedor, responsable y muy trabajador. Su negocio lo realiza en la avenida ‘Max Fernandez’ una ruta que une la ciudad de La Paz con la ciudad de El Alto.
Francisco es de tez morena, estatura mediana, su lengua materna es el aymara y utiliza el español para el comercio. Su negocio es la confección de ropa en general pero se especializa en pantalones de hombre para la venta por mayor. Él se encarga de comprar telas de diferentes colores y texturas para confeccionar pantalones de hombre de toda talla, también recibe pedidos y confecciona polleras de cholita y trajes típicos del lugar.
